entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Muncho Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:01 a.m. PDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 3.

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
